Files `deploy-eid-applet.js` and `deployJava.js` 
are unmodified copies 
extracted from `eid-applet-js-1.0.5.GA.jar` 
of `eid-applet-sdk-1.0.5.GA.zip`

`eid-applet-package-1.0.5.GA.jar`

The eid applet refuses to work directly from file: protocol.
File `test.html` is here so that it can be launched on a development 
server using the URL

  http://localhost:8000/media/lino/eid-applet/test.html
